title: Application of Sequential-Simultaneous Instructional Methods to Improve Mathematical Reasoning and Proof Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and possession of logical thinking skills
context.additional_context: A course systematically cultivating mathematical thinking required for solving workplace problems for social sector professionals, conducted flexibly in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can individually acquire and explain subject knowledge, methodological knowledge, and strategic knowledge required for constructing mathematical arguments
Learners are assessed on their ability to integrate multiple sub-elements (knowledge, skills, strategies) during proof task performance
Learners can continuously improve argument structuring and proof techniques by reflecting on formative assessment feedback

resources: LMS Platform (Video Conferencing, Discussion Board, Auto-Scoring Features)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
